title: Integers (as a subset of complex numbers) - extension

blocks.name: zgeltp1eq
blocks.content: If an integer is between another integer and its successor, the integer is equal to the other integer. (Contributed by AV, 30-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm zgeltp1eq(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wi(wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wceq(c0, c1)))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
  simprr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1))))
  zleltp1(c0, c1)
  simprl(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1)))
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz)), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, clt, co(c1, caddc, nat1))), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  zre(c0)
  zre(c1)
  letri3(c0, c1)
}
